Keywords: trend, time-series, line, growth, timeline, progress
Color Guidance: Primary: #0080FF. Multiple series: use distinct colors. Fill: 20% opacity
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Clear line patterns for colorblind users. Add pattern overlays.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top' } }, scales: { x: { type: 'time' }, y: { beginAtZero: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <LineChart><XAxis dataKey='time' /><YAxis /><Tooltip /><Legend /><Line type='monotone' dataKey='value' stroke='#0080FF' strokeWidth={2} /></LineChart>
Data_Schema: interface DataPoint { time: string; value: number; category?: string; }[]

Color Guidance: Each bar: distinct color. Category: grouped same color. Sorted: descending order
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Easy to compare. Add value labels on bars for clarity.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { responsive: true, indexAxis: 'x', plugins: { legend: { display: true } }, scales: { y: { beginAtZero: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <BarChart><XAxis dataKey='category' /><YAxis /><Tooltip /><Legend /><Bar dataKey='value' fill='#8884d8' /></BarChart>
Data_Schema: interface DataPoint { category: string; value: number; color?: string; }[]

Keywords: part-to-whole, pie, donut, percentage, proportion, share
Color Guidance: Colors: 5-6 max. Contrasting palette. Large slices first. Use labels.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Hard for accessibility. Better: Stacked bar with legend. Avoid pie if >5 items.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'doughnut', options: { cutout: '60%', plugins: { legend: { position: 'right' }, tooltip: { enabled: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <PieChart><Pie data={data} dataKey='value' nameKey='name' cx='50%' cy='50%' innerRadius={60} outerRadius={80} fill='#8884d8' label /></PieChart>
Data_Schema: interface Slice { name: string; value: number; color?: string; }[]

Color Guidance: Color axis: gradient (blue-red). Size: relative. Opacity: 0.6-0.8 to show density
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Provide data table alternative. Use pattern + color distinction.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'scatter', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: true } }, scales: { x: { type: 'linear' }, y: { type: 'linear' } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ScatterChart><XAxis dataKey='x' type='number' /><YAxis dataKey='y' type='number' /><Tooltip /><Scatter data={data} fill='#8884d8' /></ScatterChart>
Data_Schema: interface Point { x: number; y: number; z?: number; label?: string; }[]

Color Guidance: Gradient: Cool (blue) to Hot (red). Scale: clear legend. Divergent for ±data
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Colorblind: Use pattern overlay. Provide numerical legend.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'matrix', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: true } }, scales: { x: { type: 'category' }, y: { type: 'category' } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ResponsiveContainer><ComposedChart><XAxis dataKey='x' /><YAxis dataKey='y' /><Tooltip /></ComposedChart></ResponsiveContainer>
Data_Schema: interface Cell { x: string; y: string; value: number; }[]

Keywords: geographic, map, location, region, geo, spatial
Color Guidance: Regional: single color gradient or categorized colors. Legend: clear scale
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Include text labels for regions. Provide data table alternative.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'choropleth', options: { responsive: true, showOutline: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom' } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use react-simple-maps: <ComposableMap><Geographies geography={geoUrl}>{geographies.map(geo => <Geography key={geo.rsmKey} geography={geo} />)}</Geographies></ComposableMap>
Data_Schema: interface Region { id: string; value: number; name: string; }[]

Color Guidance: Stages: gradient (starting color → ending color). Show conversion %
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Clear stage labels + percentages. Good for accessibility if labeled.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { indexAxis: 'y', responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } }, scales: { x: { stacked: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <FunnelChart><Funnel dataKey='value' data={data} isAnimationActive><LabelList position='right' fill='#000' dataKey='name' /></Funnel></FunnelChart>
Data_Schema: interface Stage { stage: string; value: number; conversionRate?: number; }[]

Color Guidance: Performance: Red→Yellow→Green gradient. Target: marker line. Threshold colors
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Add numerical value + percentage label beside gauge.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'doughnut', options: { circumference: 180, rotation: -90, cutout: '75%', plugins: { tooltip: { enabled: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: <RadialBarChart innerRadius='80%' outerRadius='100%' data={data} startAngle={180} endAngle={0}><RadialBar dataKey='value' fill='#22C55E' /><Legend /></RadialBarChart>
Data_Schema: interface GaugeData { value: number; min: number; max: number; target?: number; }

Color Guidance: Actual: solid line #0080FF. Forecast: dashed #FF9500. Band: light shading
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Clearly distinguish actual vs forecast. Add legend.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top' } }, scales: { x: { type: 'time' } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ComposedChart><XAxis dataKey='time' /><YAxis /><Area dataKey='confidence' fill='#8884d8' fillOpacity={0.3} /><Line type='monotone' dataKey='actual' stroke='#0080FF' /><Line type='monotone' dataKey='forecast' stroke='#FF9500' strokeDasharray='5 5' /></ComposedChart>
Data_Schema: interface ForecastPoint { time: string; actual: number; forecast: number; confidenceLow: number; confidenceHigh: number; }[]

Color Guidance: Normal: blue #0080FF. Anomaly: red #FF0000 circle/square marker + alert
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Circle/marker for anomalies. Add text alert annotation.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { annotation: { annotations: { anomaly: { type: 'point', backgroundColor: '#FF0000' } } } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ComposedChart><XAxis dataKey='time' /><YAxis /><Line type='monotone' dataKey='value' stroke='#0080FF' /><Scatter data={anomalies} fill='#FF0000' /></ComposedChart>
Data_Schema: interface DataPoint { time: string; value: number; isAnomaly: boolean; }[]

Color Guidance: Parent: distinct hues. Children: lighter shades. White borders 2-3px.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Poor - provide table alternative. Label large areas.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'treemap', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } }, tree: { spacing: 2 } } }
Recharts_Config: <Treemap data={data} dataKey='size' aspectRatio={4/3} stroke='#fff' fill='#8884d8'><Tooltip /></Treemap>
Data_Schema: interface TreeNode { name: string; size: number; children?: TreeNode[]; }

Color Guidance: Gradient from source to target. Opacity 0.4-0.6 for flows.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Poor - provide flow table alternative.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'sankey', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { tooltip: { enabled: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <Sankey data={data} nodeWidth={10} nodePadding={20}><Tooltip /></Sankey>
Data_Schema: interface Flow { source: string; target: string; value: number; }[]

Color Guidance: Increases: #4CAF50. Decreases: #F44336. Start: #2196F3. End: #0D47A1.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Good - clear directional colors with labels.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: <BarChart><XAxis dataKey='name' /><YAxis /><Bar dataKey='value'>{data.map((e, i) => <Cell key={i} fill={e.value > 0 ? '#4CAF50' : '#F44336'} />)}</Bar></BarChart>
Data_Schema: interface WaterfallItem { category: string; value: number; type?: 'increase' | 'decrease' | 'total'; }[]

Color Guidance: Single: #0080FF 20% fill. Multiple: distinct colors per dataset.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Moderate - limit 5-8 axes. Add data table.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'radar', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top' } }, scales: { r: { beginAtZero: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <RadarChart outerRadius={90} data={data}><PolarGrid /><PolarAngleAxis dataKey='subject' /><PolarRadiusAxis /><Radar dataKey='value' stroke='#0080FF' fill='#0080FF' fillOpacity={0.2} /></RadarChart>
Data_Schema: interface RadarPoint { subject: string; A: number; B: number; fullMark: number; }[]

Color Guidance: Bullish: #26A69A. Bearish: #EF5350. Volume: 40% opacity below.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Moderate - provide OHLC data table.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'candlestick', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } }, scales: { x: { type: 'time' } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use recharts-candlestick or custom ComposedChart with Bar and ErrorBar components
Data_Schema: interface OHLC { time: string; open: number; high: number; low: number; close: number; }[]

Color Guidance: Node types: categorical colors. Edges: #90A4AE 60% opacity.
Accessibility Notes: ❌ Very Poor - provide adjacency list alternative.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'networkGraph', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: true } }, force: { repulsion: 100 } } }
Recharts_Config: Use react-force-graph or visx for network graphs - not native to Recharts
Data_Schema: interface Graph { nodes: { id: string; group: number }[]; links: { source: string; target: string; value: number }[]; }

Color Guidance: Box: #BBDEFB. Border: #1976D2. Median: #D32F2F. Outliers: #F44336.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Good - include stats table (min, Q1, median, Q3, max).
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'boxplot', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ComposedChart><XAxis dataKey='category' /><YAxis /><Bar dataKey='range' fill='#BBDEFB' stroke='#1976D2' /><Scatter dataKey='outliers' fill='#F44336' /></ComposedChart>
Data_Schema: interface BoxPlot { category: string; min: number; q1: number; median: number; q3: number; max: number; outliers?: number[]; }[]

Color Guidance: Ranges: #FFCDD2, #FFF9C4, #C8E6C9. Performance: #1976D2. Target: black 3px.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Excellent - compact with clear values.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { indexAxis: 'y', responsive: true, plugins: { annotation: { annotations: { target: { type: 'line', borderColor: 'black', borderWidth: 3 } } } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ComposedChart layout='vertical'><YAxis type='category' dataKey='name' /><XAxis type='number' /><Bar dataKey='ranges' stackId='a' fill='#C8E6C9' /><Bar dataKey='actual' fill='#1976D2' /><ReferenceLine x={target} stroke='black' strokeWidth={3} /></ComposedChart>
Data_Schema: interface BulletData { title: string; ranges: number[]; measures: number[]; markers: number[]; }[]

Color Guidance: 10x10 grid. 3-5 categories max. 2-3px spacing between squares.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Good - better than pie for accessibility.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { indexAxis: 'y', responsive: true, scales: { x: { stacked: true, max: 100 } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use @nivo/waffle: <Waffle total={100} data={data} rows={10} columns={10} />
Data_Schema: interface WaffleData { id: string; label: string; value: number; color?: string; }[]

Color Guidance: Center to outer: darker to lighter. 15-20% lighter per level.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Poor - provide hierarchy table alternative.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'doughnut', options: { cutout: '0%', plugins: { legend: { display: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use recharts-sunburst or visx for sunburst charts
Data_Schema: interface SunburstNode { name: string; value?: number; children?: SunburstNode[]; }

Keywords: root cause, decomposition, tree, hierarchy, drill-down, ai-split
Color Guidance: Nodes: #2563EB (Primary) vs #EF4444 (Negative impact). Connectors: Neutral grey.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ clear hierarchy. Allow keyboard navigation for nodes.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'tree', options: { responsive: true, tree: { orientation: 'horizontal' }, plugins: { legend: { display: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use react-flow: <ReactFlow nodes={nodes} edges={edges} fitView><Background /><Controls /></ReactFlow>
Data_Schema: interface DecisionTree { id: string; label: string; parentId?: string; value?: string; }[]

Color Guidance: Depth cues: lighting/shading. Z-axis: color gradient (cool to warm).
Accessibility Notes: ❌ Poor - requires alternative 2D view or data table.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'scatter3D', options: { responsive: true, scales: { x: { type: 'linear' }, y: { type: 'linear' }, z: { type: 'linear' } } } }
Recharts_Config: Not supported in Recharts - use @react-three/fiber with drei for 3D
Data_Schema: interface Point3D { x: number; y: number; z: number; category?: string; }[]

Keywords: streaming, real-time, ticker, live, velocity, pulse
Color Guidance: Current: Bright Pulse (#00FF00). History: Fading opacity. Grid: Dark.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Flashing elements - provide pause button. High contrast.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, animation: { duration: 0 }, scales: { x: { type: 'realtime' } } } }
Recharts_Config: <AreaChart data={streamData} isAnimationActive={false}><XAxis dataKey='time' /><YAxis /><Area type='monotone' dataKey='value' stroke='#00FF00' fill='#00FF00' fillOpacity={0.3} /></AreaChart>
Data_Schema: interface StreamData { time: string; value: number; }[]

Color Guidance: Positive: #22C55E. Negative: #EF4444. Neutral: #94A3B8. Size = Frequency.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Word clouds poor for screen readers. Use list view.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'wordCloud', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use react-wordcloud: <WordCloud words={words} options={{ colors: ['#22C55E', '#94A3B8', '#EF4444'] }} />
Data_Schema: interface Word { text: string; value: number; sentiment?: 'pos' | 'neg' | 'neu'; }[]

Keywords: process, mining, variants, path, bottleneck, log
Color Guidance: Happy path: #10B981 (Thick). Deviations: #F59E0B (Thin). Bottlenecks: #EF4444.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Complex graphs hard to navigate. Provide path summary.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'sankey', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { tooltip: { enabled: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use react-flow: <ReactFlow nodes={processNodes} edges={processEdges}><Background variant='dots' /><MiniMap /></ReactFlow>
Data_Schema: interface ProcessNode { id: string; label: string; type: string; } interface ProcessEdge { source: string; target: string; label?: string; }

Keywords: candlestick, ohlc, trading, stocks, financial, market
Secondary Options: OHLC Bar, Heikin-Ashi, Line with range
Color Guidance: Bullish: #22C55E. Bearish: #EF4444. Volume: 30% opacity. Grid: subtle #E5E7EB.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Provide data table alternative. Color-blind friendly with icons.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'candlestick', options: { responsive: true, scales: { x: { type: 'time' }, y: { position: 'right' } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use lightweight-charts or custom ComposedChart with Bar components for OHLC
Data_Schema: interface OHLCV { time: string; open: number; high: number; low: number; close: number; volume: number; }[]

Keywords: confusion, matrix, ml, classification, model, accuracy
Color Guidance: True Positive/Negative: #22C55E gradient. False: #EF4444 gradient. Diagonal highlight.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Clear labels essential. Include precision/recall metrics.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'matrix', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { tooltip: { enabled: true } }, scales: { color: { type: 'color' } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use @nivo/heatmap: <HeatMap data={matrix} keys={labels} indexBy='actual' colors={{ type: 'diverging', scheme: 'red_yellow_green' }} />
Data_Schema: interface ConfusionMatrix { actual: string; predicted: string; count: number; }[]

Keywords: kpi, sparkline, metric, indicator, trend, card
Color Guidance: KPI value: Large #0F172A. Sparkline: #3B82F6. Trend: Green up Red down.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Include numeric values. Trend direction with text.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } }, scales: { x: { display: false }, y: { display: false } }, elements: { point: { radius: 0 } } } }
Recharts_Config: <AreaChart width={100} height={40} data={sparkData}><Area type='monotone' dataKey='value' stroke='#3B82F6' fill='#3B82F6' fillOpacity={0.2} /></AreaChart>
Data_Schema: interface SparkLine { time: string; value: number; }[]

Keywords: gauge, speedometer, progress, dial, radial, meter
Color Guidance: Zones: Red #EF4444 Yellow #F59E0B Green #22C55E. Needle: #1E293B.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Add numeric value display. Clear zone labels.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'doughnut', options: { circumference: 270, rotation: 225, cutout: '80%', plugins: { tooltip: { enabled: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: <RadialBarChart innerRadius='60%' outerRadius='100%' data={gaugeData} startAngle={225} endAngle={-45}><PolarAngleAxis type='number' domain={[0, 100]} tick={false} /><RadialBar dataKey='value' cornerRadius={10} fill='#22C55E' /></RadialBarChart>
Data_Schema: interface GaugeValue { value: number; max: number; unit: string; }

Secondary Options: Gauge, Progress Bar, Bar with Target
Color Guidance: Ranges: Light to dark gray gradient. Actual: #3B82F6. Target: Black 2px line.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Excellent accessibility. Clear value labels.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { indexAxis: 'y', responsive: true, plugins: { annotation: { annotations: { target: { type: 'line', borderColor: '#000', borderWidth: 2 } } } } } }
Recharts_Config: <ComposedChart layout='vertical'><YAxis type='category' dataKey='name' hide /><XAxis type='number' /><Bar dataKey='poor' stackId='range' fill='#E5E7EB' /><Bar dataKey='ok' stackId='range' fill='#CBD5E1' /><Bar dataKey='good' stackId='range' fill='#94A3B8' /><Bar dataKey='actual' fill='#3B82F6' /><ReferenceLine x={target} stroke='#000' strokeWidth={2} /></ComposedChart>
Data_Schema: interface BulletChart { target: number; actual: number; rangeLow: number; rangeMid: number; rangeHigh: number; }

Keywords: stream, flow, volume, stacked, area, time
Color Guidance: Color per category. Center-aligned baseline. 60-80% opacity.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Hard to read exact values. Provide data table.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, scales: { y: { stacked: true } }, elements: { line: { tension: 0.4, fill: true } } } }
Recharts_Config: <AreaChart stackOffset='silhouette'><XAxis dataKey='time' /><YAxis />{categories.map(cat => <Area type='monotone' dataKey={cat} stackId='1' fill={colors[cat]} fillOpacity={0.7} />)}</AreaChart>
Data_Schema: interface StreamLayer { id: string; data: { x: any; y: number }[]; }[]

Color Guidance: Increase: #22C55E. Decrease: #EF4444. Total: #3B82F6. Connectors: #94A3B8.
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Good accessibility with clear labels. Show running total.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: <BarChart><XAxis dataKey='name' /><YAxis /><Bar dataKey='start' stackId='a' fill='transparent' /><Bar dataKey='value' stackId='a'>{data.map((e, i) => <Cell key={i} fill={e.type === 'increase' ? '#22C55E' : '#EF4444'} />)}</Bar></BarChart>
Data_Schema: interface FinancialWaterfall { label: string; amount: number; isTotal?: boolean; }[]

Color Guidance: Color per group. Arc connections 40% opacity. Hover highlight 100%.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Complex for screen readers. Provide matrix alternative.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'chord', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { tooltip: { enabled: true } }, arc: { borderWidth: 1 } } }
Recharts_Config: Use @nivo/chord: <Chord matrix={matrix} keys={keys} colors={{ scheme: 'nivo' }} arcOpacity={0.65} ribbonOpacity={0.4} />
Data_Schema: interface ChordMatrix { keys: string[]; matrix: number[][]; }

Color Guidance: Lines: Category colors 40% opacity. Axes: #64748B. Selected: 100% bright.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Complex visualization. Limit to 5-8 dimensions. Provide table.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'line', options: { responsive: true, plugins: { legend: { display: true } }, scales: { y: { display: false } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use @visx/shape ParallelCoordinates or D3.js - not native to Recharts
Data_Schema: interface ParallelData { [dimension: string]: number | string; }[]

Color Guidance: Category colors. Width = market size. Height = share. Clear borders.
Accessibility Notes: ⚠ Can be confusing. Clear labels essential. Provide breakdown table.
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', options: { responsive: true, scales: { x: { stacked: true }, y: { stacked: true, max: 100 } } } }
Recharts_Config: Use @nivo/marimekko: <Marimekko data={data} id='segment' value='population' dimensions={dimensions} innerPadding={3} />
Data_Schema: interface MekkoData { x: string; y: string; value: number; }[]

Keywords: observable, plot, exploratory, data analysis, declarative, grammar, EDA
Color Guidance: Auto-generated semantic scales
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Built-in accessibility. Semantic color scales.
Library Recommendation: Observable Plot for rapid prototyping, declarative grammar
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'plot', options: { responsive: true, marks: [] } }
Recharts_Config: Plot.plot({ marks: [Plot.dot(data, {x: 'x', y: 'y'})] })
Data_Schema: interface ExploratoryData { [key: string]: number | string; }[]

Keywords: nivo, react, charts, animated, SSR, server-side, rendering, dashboard
Color Guidance: Built-in color schemes customizable
Accessibility Notes: ✓ Animation + theming. Motion reduced option.
Library Recommendation: Nivo for rich animated React charts with SSR support
ChartJS_Config: { type: 'bar', theme: 'nivo', animate: true }
Recharts_Config: <ResponsiveBar data={data} keys={['value']} indexBy='category' colors={{ scheme: 'nivo' }} animate={true} />
Data_Schema: interface NivoData { category: string; value: number; }[]
